Live to Dance Paula Abdul : Simon Cowell and I always talk about working together By Elizabeth Kwiatkowski, 02/09/2011 Paula Abdul has confirmed that she and fellow former American Idol Simon Cowell have discussed working together again. He always talks to me about, "We will work together somehow, some way,' and he"s an acquired taste but I love him very much, the Live To Dance star said during a Tuesday appearance on The Tonight Show with Jay Leno .
